summary: Frontend testing completed for tarifa per persona-servicio feature. All 7 test cases passed. The tarifa field has been successfully removed from Servicios and is now configured per person-service combination in Personas. When creating/editing movimientos, the tarifa is pre-filled from the persona-servicio configuration but remains editable.
passed_tests: Servicios page does NOT show Tarifa column (only Orden, Nombre, Acciones)
Servicios form does NOT have Tarifa field (only Nombre and Orden de Secuencia)
Servicios form shows helper text: 'Las tarifas se configuran en la ficha de cada Persona'
Personas page shows services with tarifas in badges (e.g., 'Corte (S/ 0.75)')
Persona edit form shows 'Servicios y Tarifas' section with tarifa input per selected service
Persona edit form shows Juan Pérez with Corte service and tarifa 0.75
MovimientosProduccion page - persona dropdown shows tarifa next to name (Juan Pérez (S/ 0.75/prenda))
MovimientosProduccion page - selecting persona pre-fills tarifa from persona-servicio (0.75)
MovimientosProduccion page - tarifa field is editable
MovimientosProduccion page - helper text shows 'Tarifa configurada para esta persona: S/ 0.75'
RegistroForm page - persona dropdown shows tarifa next to name (Juan Pérez (S/ 0.75/prenda))
RegistroForm page - selecting persona pre-fills tarifa from persona-servicio (0.75)
RegistroForm page - tarifa field is editable
RegistroForm page - helper text shows 'Tarifa configurada para esta persona: S/ 0.75'
seed_data_creation: Used existing test data: Juan Pérez with Corte service and tarifa S/0.75
context_for_next_testing_agent: Tarifa per persona-servicio feature fully implemented and tested. Key changes: 1) ServicioProduccion model no longer has tarifa field, 2) PersonaProduccion has servicios array with {servicio_id, tarifa} objects, 3) When creating movimientos, selecting a persona pre-fills tarifa_aplicada from the persona-servicio configuration, 4) Tarifa remains editable in movimiento forms. Test data: Juan Pérez has tarifa S/0.75 for Corte service.

servicios_sin_tarifa.table: No Tarifa column - only Orden, Nombre, Acciones
servicios_sin_tarifa.form: No Tarifa field - only Nombre and Orden de Secuencia
servicios_sin_tarifa.helper_text: Shows 'Las tarifas se configuran en la ficha de cada Persona'

personas_con_tarifa_por_servicio.table: Shows 'Servicios (Tarifa)' column with badges showing service name and tarifa
personas_con_tarifa_por_servicio.form: Shows 'Servicios y Tarifas' section with checkbox per service and tarifa input when selected

movimientos_tarifa_prellenada.persona_dropdown: Shows persona name with tarifa (Juan Pérez (S/ 0.75/prenda))
movimientos_tarifa_prellenada.helper_text: Shows 'Tarifa configurada para esta persona: S/ 0.75'

registro_form_movimientos.persona_dropdown: Shows persona name with tarifa (Juan Pérez (S/ 0.75/prenda))
registro_form_movimientos.helper_text: Shows 'Tarifa configurada para esta persona: S/ 0.75'
